definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)
to take note of/to pay attention to
idea/opinion/meaning/wish/desire/interest/fun/token of appreciation, affection etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to give as a small token/to do sth as a gesture of goodwill etc

sentences.english: Eringi Cream White Sauce Spaghetti with minced meat.
sentences.chinese: 杏鲍菇肉末忌廉白汁意面条。

sentences.english: Yea, thou castest off fear, and restrainest prayer before God.
sentences.chinese: 你是废弃敬畏的意，在神面前阻止敬虔的心。

sentences.english: He looked through the hotel advertisements until one of them took his fancy.
sentences.chinese: 他查遍旅馆广告，直到有一家中了他的意。

sentences.english: The words are some fancies that tie up Mian, the left Zheng feels throat some Yangs Yang, the eyelid lets go of.
sentences.chinese: 话有些缠绵意，左筝觉得嗓子有些痒痒，眼帘放下。

sentences.english: He saw through the hotel advertisements until an of them took his fancy.
sentences.chinese: 他查遍旅馆广告，直到有一家中了他的意。

sentences.english: Post in English only for hard working, no other meaning.
sentences.chinese: 发言使用英文仅仅是为了提高英文水平，别无他意。

sentences.english: We have state-of-the-art technology in the industry.
sentences.chinese: 中文意为我们拥有业内最先进的技术。

sentences.english: You can also use a laminated board, marble or glass surface.
sentences.chinese: 你可以先黏上面板或背板，随你的意。

sentences.english: These verbs mean to reprimand or criticize angrily or vehemently .
sentences.chinese: 这些动词意为愤怒或恶毒地斥责或批评。

sentences.english: Our company will never afford (free lunch for )the unearned people.
sentences.chinese: 吃白饭，意为不劳而获，吃免费的午餐。

sentences.english: At the same time, the rarity of execution means it is no deterrent.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，绞刑的极少执行意也味着它不具有威慑性。

sentences.english: SIS : Shimano Index System. Their name for basic click shifting.
sentences.chinese: 意为“喜玛诺指针系统”，是基本的点击变速。

sentences.english: It costs sb. some money to do sth.
sentences.chinese: 意为“某人花了多少钱做某事”。

sentences.english: His proposal doesn't sit well with manager of the department。
sentences.chinese: 他的议案不太合部门经理的意。

sentences.english: When did this word meet you needs?
sentences.chinese: 这个世界什么时候又顺过你的意了？

sentences.english: The word beer itself comes from a Latin verb meaning "to drink", and the ancient Romans were certainly no strangers to the brew.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒这个词源自拉丁文动词，意为“饮用”。

definition: inadvertent/accidental/to have no intention of (doing sth)
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
according with one's wish or expectation
